title: The Child Without a Diaper
description: "The Child Without a Diaper" is a heartwarming children's story about Jiang Pa, a little boy in Beijing who wears open-crotch pants instead of diapers. Facing exclusion, he proves his resilience in a Great Wall race, teaching his peers the value of acceptance, self-confidence, and embracing differences.
author: Fabrizio Grizzanti
